name: TS Prototype V0.2
description:
An extremely incomplete prototype. Has some interesting ideas, but I had no time to work on it this past week, very busy. Organizing a site for the GGJ 2019, making games for work, lots of meetings, organizing sponsorships, bank account fraud I had to deal with, some terrible drama, blah blah blah.

For Weekly Game Jam, Week 80, Theme: Winning is Losing. Did have some fun ideas for the theme but they aren't incorporated in this prototype yet.

I'll put more time into future Weekly Game Jams. Even if I can't put more than a few hours into a project, I do want to do this every week from now on.
